Class NeonConfig

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.NeonConfig
@PublicAPI public class NeonConfig extends Object
Configuration class for Project Neon networking parameters. All timing values are in milliseconds, all size values are in bytes.

Default values are tuned for typical game networking scenarios. Adjust based on your specific requirements:

  • Lower timeouts for fast-paced games on reliable networks
  • Higher timeouts for turn-based games or unreliable networks
  • Larger buffers for high-bandwidth data transfer
  • Stricter rate limits for public servers

Configuration can be created using:

  • Default constructor with fluent setters: new NeonConfig().setBufferSize(2048)...
  • Builder pattern: NeonConfig.builder().bufferSize(2048)...build()

Thread safety: This class is not thread-safe. Create and configure instances before passing to Neon components. Once passed to a component, configuration should not be modified.

Since:
1.0

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Validates all configuration values and throws IllegalArgumentException if any are invalid. Called automatically when config is applied to components.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any configuration value is invalid
